"A.D.2028/4/17/14:00": "That Mother Cluster... building something so gigantic on the moon."
"According to information from Ardem, this location was once used to spread Ether across the world."
"Under the cooperation of various nations, even after Ether was dispersed, transportation of raw materials continued to take place. The reason why is unclear."
"Seems like everyone has been blowing money on this."
"Not only is the air here breathable, but the gravity is fully controlled. They've been hiding some insane technology."
"Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic... I wonder which one this is?"
"Of course. When it comes to technology like this, only Mother Cluster could have done it."
"You could use magic to create the materials, but I don't know of a way to control gravity using magic... I think it's probably science."
"Regardless of materials, this level of science is far beyond anything on Earth. Even using Ether."
"I wonder... did Mother Cluster invade the ARKS universe in order to steal this sort of technology?"
"...Well, we can't worry about that right now. We have to save Hitsugi first."
"I'm trying to locate Hitsugi's signal, but scanners there are being jammed, so it's not going very well."
"If they're trying to interfere, that means there's something they don't want us to see at the heart. Let's go, <%me>."
